alert.note: Alert for Attala; Leake (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued March 30 at 5:32PM CDT until March 30 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Northwestern Leake County in central Mississippi... Eastern Attala County in central Mississippi... * Until 615 PM CDT. * At 532 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Singleton, or 10 miles south of Kosciusko, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Smyrna and Zama around 540 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Mccool and Ethel. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
